items.sentence: Tom's sister just got over the flu and now he has it.

Do you think you can make it to Boston for Christmas?
I'm sorry that I wasn't able to attend Tom's funeral.
Do you think that Tom would care if I didn't do that?
Why did Tom think that it was a good idea to do that?
I think it's highly unlikely Tom will drink any beer.

This is the hottest summer we've had in thirty years.

I gave up trying to act professional a long time ago.
